name: AutoScrape
description: Crawl and submit search queries on interactive sites.

parameters.name: Beginning URL
parameters.description: A start URL for crawling or interacting with a site.

parameters.name: Maximum crawl depth
parameters.description: This sets the deepest in a crawl AutoScrape will go. 0 means no limit.

parameters.name: Leave host?
parameters.description: This option lets the scraper leave the host found in the beginning URL.

parameters.name: Link priority by text
parameters.description: This sets a priority for links to click, by their text. If this is specified, AutoScrape will click these links before trying any others. Multiple strings can be separated by the | character and regex is allowed.

parameters.name: Ignored links by text
parameters.description: This option allows you to specify links, by their text, that will be completely ignored by AutoScrape. Multiple strings can be separated by the | character and regex is allowed.

parameters.name: Interact with forms?
parameters.description: Enable this to configure AutoScrape to interact with search forms.

parameters.name: Form text match
parameters.description: Input some text that will be found in the search form that should be scraped.
